entry.def: Mounted police or soldiers ride horses when they are on duty.

example.ex: A dozen mounted police rode into the square.
example.tran: 十几名骑警进入了广场。

means.word_mean: 1. assembled for use; especially by being attached to a support
2. decorated with applied ornamentation; often used in combination;

sentences.sentence: "the trim brass-mounted carbine of the ranger"- F.V.W.Mason
